title: I love how instead of nerfing Vayne
body:

her Q alone would make her garbage toplane against 90% of the match ups

kai'sa E and R are just better if a champ wants to be mobile in teamfight, vayne's tumble dash is so small it just acts as a range extension, it cannot even cross walls due to how small it is

Dude Vayne's tumble has like 1 sec cd late and she also gains 1 sec stealth after every Tumble. That alone makes her VERY mobile. Her E is also a very power disengage tool. Kaisa does not have any disengage tool. 

Also, Vayne has a more powerful lategame and no itemization can work against Vayne. At least against Kaisa, tanks can still deal with her. 

Kaisa's ultimate only work against champs she recently damaged or a champ ur team cc'd. Cant really be used for disengage. 

Her tumble range may seem small, but it is 250 range compared to flash 400 range. So like, sure it is smaller, but its 1 sec cd and stealth is enough to kite so many champs. Her Q tumble is super amazing to dodge skillshots as well, which Kaisa cant really do since Tumble is quite quick tiny dash.

kai'sa E gives 150% bonus movement speed, it makes her able to cross SO MUCH distances, and the cooldown is reduced when she uses AA. to give you an idea, if she has 400 ms she will have 1000 ms (without taking in consideration the movement speed soft cap)

but most importantly ITS HER ULT that gives her more mobility, she can join a fight from far away, reposition by crossing walls with it, or even switch targets inside a fight.

But you cant dodge skillshots cosistently with kaisa, you have your R on high cd and maybe E when with vayne you have Q every 2 sec. Q is the better mobility tool than kaisa R/E even if only travels small distance. I shit on kaisa everytime I get to play against her, such a bad champ, nice looking with kda skin thats all.
